sentences.english: These let you play split screen multiplayer games on the same machine.
sentences.chinese: 這些讓你玩上分在同一臺機器屏幕多人遊戲。

sentences.english: When organizing clothing or other items on shelves, you should use shelf dividers .
sentences.chinese: 把衣服在架子上分好後，你就用得着衣架隔板了。

sentences.english: But it was your serve, so unfortunately I didn't get a point.
sentences.chinese: 但那次是你發球，所以我纔不幸沒得上分的。

sentences.english: From the sub-structure, PLC is divided into fixed and modular two.
sentences.chinese: 從結構上分，PLC分爲固定式和組合式兩種。

sentences.english: The ruler is divided into centimetres.
